attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that speed cameras are a great way to slow the driver down and save lives. But we are all human and do make errors. Therefore I would like to consider that on any first recorded offence you should receive a warning, second offence £100 fine and third offence £100 fine plus three points. It is a fairer way as most people like my self do make the odd error, due to personal and work stress and family problems.  I am a very conscientious driver and feel that because of one error due to family concerns it has turning me into a criminal.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
